data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

Final Prompt: A gaunt Human Shaman, an Obsidian Crag Siphoner, stands on the jagged, dark volcanic surface of the corrupted Obsidian Crag. They are mid-ritual, siphoning sickly purple mana from a sacrificed, withered creature at their feet, with dark, shadow-like tattoos glowing faintly on their skin. The background features a blighted nebula-sea under a starless, oppressive sky, emphasizing the spread of corruption and scarcity.

Artist Credit: inspired by Dave Kendall

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
